name: Hellfire Tactics
description:
• 30+ Arch Demons to choose from
  • Each with their own unique play style and combinations



  • Draft from 90+ units in a shared pool amongst all players
  • 8+ different unit clans each with their own unique rules
  • Change your board, linked units provide interesting placements to maximize your team
  • 100's of different ways to combine units to be victorious
  • Overpowered end game units can make or break your strategy

Rare Artifacts

  • Combine 3 of the same unit to gain a rare artifact
  • Artifacts can give board wide boosts or allow for explosive combinations

Sacred Rituals

  • Rituals allow for short term buffs at the expensive of Mana
  • They can be the difference maker for your next fight
